name: Linkdex Ltd
description: Developer of an enterprise data platform designed to improve search engine visibility. The company's activities include providing a combined search intelligence platform along with advanced tools to improve rankings, traffic and revenues online, enabling businesses, brands and agencies to grow and lead the increasingly critical SEO channel.
